title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed 'Open WebUI') with chat, model management, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous clients for chat, embeddings, and model operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama offering idiomatic Ruby methods to run and chat with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with prompt templates, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as a free local copilot alternative.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images for Ollama server with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) and CPU-only variants.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and native targets.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with both REST and gRPC support.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor terminal.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, published as 'github.com/ollama/ollama/api'.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a web UI and REST layer around Ollama with user accounts and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints with OpenAI-compatible chat completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.
